attribute_definition: DWR assigned ID number associated with the urban retail water supplier
ID number associated with water system in the supplier service area
Name of water supplier # TODO is there a more detailed description of this
In 2020, projections about water use/supply in a given year # TODO revise description
The UWMP these data were reported in
Expected total water use (acre feet) for the given year that is assumed to be within a five-year drought period. # TODO is the assumption that total is both potable and nonpotable?
Expected total water supplies (acre feet) for the given year that is assumed to be within a five-year drought period. # TODO is the assumption that total is both potable and nonpotable?
Additional water quantity (acre feet) resulting from a supply augmentation action.
Additional water quantity (acre feet) resulting from a demand reduction action.
